features.1: Updated to work with updated manufacturing dashboard foldering
Added back message when readers successfully sweep
features.2: Changed color of start/stop buttons to green/red, respectively
features.4: Moved user authentication to before the setup reader screen.
features.5: Added an admin setting to change the device ID
features.7: Removed autogenerated ID from title until after setup is submitted.

bugfixes.1: Fixed software update functionality and messaging.
Fixed bug with run export destination location.

features.1: Improved visuals on setup form options
features.2: Various fixes for visuals with raspberry pi
features.3: Moved display toggle to a button next to the plot rather than the menubar.
features.4: Fixed software updating and release notes, placed it in the sidebar
features.5: Added raspberry pi configurations for compatibility.
features.6: Added KPI form next to plot with experiment details.
features.7: Updated visuals to work with raspberry pi

bugfixes.1: Fixed calibration to work when not calibrating

features.1: Added random number generator for Lot ID
features.2: Embedded reader setup form rather than a popup.
features.3: Added a dialog to the software update dialog to restart the computer.
features.4: Added identifier to title of reader grid with Lot ID.
features.5: Added splash screen while UI loads.
features.6: Increased size of software update dropdown.
features.7: Uploads raw data scans to AWS once every 3 hours
features.8: Implemented harvest algorithm indicator to inform user of saturation time.
features.9: Added functionality to display saturation time on the dashboard.
features.10: Added dynamodb functionality to enhance dashboard experience.

bugfixes.1: Added support for new hubs by limiting usage to USB2.
bugfixes.2: Added touchscreen scrolling support for release notes dialog
bugfixes.3: Fixed footer disappearing when software update is available.
bugfixes.4: Fixed footer disappearing when there is no software update after equilibration
bugfixes.5: Enabled AWS reconnection after internet disruption
bugfixes.6: Lot ID and start date now properly reset on new runs from the same square.

other.2: Utilized built in system.platform to get OS.
